value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The path through the mountains
is closed away into darkness up
ahead. We can't go this way...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|This is the most direct route.$k$pAs I said earlier, I do not know that
I can dispel the darkness. But this
will give me the opportunity to try.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|All right. In that case, we can keep
to this path.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アウグスト,ch07_17_August_M_Normal,Face|There is nothing I cannot do.
Leave everything to me.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|All right, then... I may be extremely
nervous about this, but I will not let
that stop me. I will now begin.$k$p$EFace|My soul is meant for peace...
My body, meant for the people...$k$pMy blood, meant to bring light...
Cleanse the dark. Open. Reveal.$k$p$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$Fi2000|The darkness...it's disappearing!
It worked!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Excellent! That means Letizia is no
longer any threat to us!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Wow, that was amazing, Ash!$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Ash?$k$pAre you all right? Is something
the matter?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Ah, no, no... Forgive me. You need
not worry yourselves over me.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Thank you, Ash. Because of you,
Askr is as good as saved.$k$pIf we just keep moving along like this,
you can take care of the darkness
in the other places the same way!$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes. Of course. That is the logical
course of action.$k$pI am glad I'm able to be of use
to you after all.$k$p$Sbs150|
